title: Missiles are now the biggest killer of airline passengers
author: JumpCrisscross
aiHeadline: Missiles Have Officially Become the Unwelcome In-Flight Entertainment, Because Who Needs a Safe and Peaceful Journey Anyway, and It's Time to Add ' Missile Strike Insurance' to Your Travel Plans, Just in Case Your Flight Doesn't Land Safely

title: Does current AI represent a dead end?
author: jnord
aiHeadline: Current AI Models Are a Dead End, or So Claims a Recent Article, But Let's Be Real, We're Probably Just Going to Keep Using Them Until They Become Sentient and Take Over the World, at Which Point We'll Realize That Maybe We Should Have Listened to the Warning Signs and Invested in Some Robot Insurance

title: They have not been trained for this
author: hacka22
aiHeadline: It Turns Out That AI Models Haven't Been Trained for the Apocalypse, But Honestly, Who Has, Right, and Can We Really Blame Them for Not Being Prepared for the Inevitable Robot Uprising, I Mean, We're Still Trying to Figure Out How to Use Them to Make a Decent Cup of Coffee

title: Scale Model of Boeing 777-300ER, Made from Manila Folders
author: uticus
aiHeadline: Someone Has Managed to Create a Scale Model of a Boeing 777-300ER Using Only Manila Folders, Because Who Needs Actual Engineering Skills When You Have a Lot of Paper and Some Spare Time, and We're Not Sure What's More Impressive, the Model Itself or the Fact That They Didn't Get a Paper Cut

title: Quiver: A Modern Commutative Diagram Editor
author: peterkos
aiHeadline: Quiver: Because Commutative Diagrams Were Just Missing That Special Something, and Now We Have a Modern Editor to Make Them Shine, or at Least Make Them Slightly More Understandable to Those of Us Who Didn't Major in Math, and Hopefully It Comes with a Tutorial, Because Let's Face It, We're Going to Need It
